Authenticity Contact Shipping Returns Important Information Up to auction is a brand new Michael Kors Rhea Zip Belt Bag. This chic MK bag is made of full grain pebble leather, and accented with gunmetal tone hardware. It features sophisticated pyramid studs in the front, zipped main compartment, a zipped back pocket, and adjustable straps. Please buy with confidence. We appreciate your trust! Contact We try all our best to solve any after sale issue and make sure you have a great buying experience. Please contact us through ebay message. We answer all after sale messages within one business day. Shipping Shipping Time: We try all of our best to ship within 1 business day after receiving your payment during Monday to Friday. All the items paid on Saturday and Sunday will be shipped on Monday morning. Packaging: We use heavy duty shipping box or padded envelope and pack each item carefully to ensure it arrives just like you buy from any local fine stores. International combined shipping: We always combine shipping for international customers. We offer free shipping for wallet and other accessory with the purchase of a bag. Each additional bag shipping cost is $10.00. Please contact us to set up a private listing for your combined shipping order. Shipping methods and delivery times: Continental 48 states: Bag: USPS Priority Mail or UPS Ground; delivery time is 1-5 business days. Wallet, watch, and other accessories: USPS First Class Mail; delivery time is 3-5 business days. HI, AK, PR, and GU: All items: USPS Priority Mail; delivery time is around 5 business days. APO/FPO: All items: USPS Priority Mail. We hope that buyers using APO/FPO address understand that sometimes the delivery to APO/FPO address takes longer than expected. Almost all the items we shipped to APO address arrive within 1 week. However, we met some extremely cases which the items were delivered after 30 days. International Shipping We offer EMS and Priority Mail shipping to all countries. Both EMS and Priority Mail have tracking number. Please refer shipping section for detailed shipping rate. Returns We understand the challenges of online shopping, especially for the fashion items. In order to offer customers worry free shopping experiences, we offer 14 days return & exchange policy and do not charge any restocking fee. At the same time, we appreciate that the customer can follow our return policy, helping us to avoid high return cost. Please make sure: 1.Contact us within 14 days of receipt for return or exchange instruction. 2. All returns must be in the unused and original condition. 3. All product tags must be attached. 4. Return shipping cost is buyer’s responsibility. Important Information International Delivery time: The international delivery time showed at ebay is estimated average delivery time. A lot of factors, such as custom clearance, may cause longer delivery time. The delivery to some countries, such as Russia and Brazil, may be much longer than estimated. Imperfection of the leather: Individual leathers display their own natural and unique marks that enhance the characteristics of the products. We usually call these marks as the imperfection of the leather. Especially, the vintage type of leather often has unique characteristics, such as wrinkles, natural scratches, distressed finishing, and rough texture. All these imperfection signs are considered as positive features, not defects. If you are not familiar with certain type of leather, please contact us. Dimensions: Please refer to the link of Measurement Guide for the handbag measurement method we use. Our measurements may differ from those from other sellers or products’ official measurements.
